Title: Crossfire
Plot: After his attempt to sever ties with Abu Nazir, Brody finds himself reliving his captivity and recommits to his mission; Carrie finds herself in the middle of a public relations nightmare on the heels of the mosque shooting.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Chris Chalk, Hrach Titizian, Jamey Sheridan, Navid Negahban, Rohan Chand, Ramsey Faragallah, Billy Smith
